attributes.action: Bring about Legislation to ensure bicycle pay road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bicycle users are road users, and as such should be required to pay road tax, as do all other road users. Bicycle users have no regard for the safety of other road users, and should be made to pay their fair share.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
